byline.original: By KATIE BENNER and LESLIE PICKER

abstract: Shareholders of mobile security software maker Good Technology file suit in Delaware Chancery Court against J P Morgan; amended complaint accuses investment bank of conflict of interest that resulted in Good selling itself to Blackberry for about half its worth.
lead_paragraph: The investment bank was advising both Good and BlackBerry at the time of a sale.
snippet: The investment bank was advising both Good and BlackBerry at the time of a sale....

headline.main: Good Technology Investors Sue J.P. Morgan, Claiming Conflicts
headline.print_headline: Good Technology Shareholders Sue J.P. Morgan, Claiming Conflicts
